sense.name: a pupil, one enrolled in an educational program
sense.examples: John is dating one of the student nurses at school. Only 15 percent of American college students are majoring in engineering. That's a dormitory just for the law students.

sense.name: a scholar or systematic observer of a subject matter
sense.examples: Bob's father was a life-long student of the Renaissance. That economist, and nobel laureate, has long been a student of the free market. Phil is the most enthusiastic student of gourmet cooking in his group house. (amateur pursuit)
